TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为服务说明内的服务说明格式扩展指定要使用的 XML 命名空间和 XML 命名空间前缀。

span.span: Specifies the XML namespace and XML namespace prefix to use for a service description format extension within a service description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务说明格式扩展扩展了如何为使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web service 生成服务说明。A service description format extension extends how a service description is generated for an XML Web service created using ASP.NET. 具体来说，服务说明格式扩展将 XML 元素添加到服务说明中。Specifically, a service description format extension adds XML elements to the service description. 当 SOAP 扩展构建为在 XML Web service 的客户端和服务器端运行时，这非常有用，因为有关 SOAP 扩展的信息不会自动放置在服务说明中。This is useful when a SOAP extension is built to run on both the client and server side of an XML Web service, as information about SOAP extensions is not automatically placed in the service description. 如果将有关 SOAP 扩展的信息添加到服务说明中，则客户端可能会解释它必须运行特定的 SOAP 扩展。If you add information about the SOAP extension to the service description, a client can thus interpret that it must run the specific SOAP extension. 必须在客户端和服务器上同时运行的 SOAP 扩展的一个示例是加密 SOAP 扩展。An example of a SOAP extension that must run on both the client and server is an encryption SOAP extension. 如果加密 SOAP 扩展仅在服务器上运行，并且它在将返回值发送回客户端之前对其进行加密，则客户端必须运行 SOAP 扩展以对 SOAP 消息进行解密。If an encryption SOAP extension runs on only the server, and it encrypts return values before sending them back to the client, the client must have the SOAP extension running to decrypt the SOAP message. 否则，客户端无法处理返回值。Otherwise, the client cannot process the return value. 使用以下步骤生成服务说明格式扩展：Use the following steps to build a service description format extension: 1. 生成一个从派生的类 。Build a class that derives from . 2. 将应用 到类，并指定应在其上运行服务说明格式扩展的扩展点。Apply a to the class and specify the extension points at which the service description format extension should run. 3. （可选）将应用于 类并指定类中的成员作为新的扩展点。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify a member within the class to act as a new extension point. 4. （可选）将应用 到类，并指定要与服务说明格式扩展生成的 xml 元素关联的 xml 命名空间前缀。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify the XML namespace prefix to be associated with XML elements generated by the service description format extension. 5. 在配置文件的节中配置要运行的服务说明格式扩展 `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` 。Configure the service description format extension to run within the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` section of the configuration file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#1)]
